attributes.action: Fill in the potholes around Surrey and Berkshire areas!
attributes.additional_details: Town Facebook groups including Camberley, Woking, Bracknell, Ascot, Sunningdale, Guildford are some examples which hold many complaints of the ever growing potholes and damaged cars.
attributes.background: More than ever potholes are becoming a major issue on the roads in Surrey and Berkshire areas. It is without fail that you are to expect to dodge around at least one pothole per road you go down. It seems as if the roads are becoming dangerous and undrivable.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local roads are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
